query.querystr: procedure p1,p2; if i1,i2; variable v1; Select v1 such that Contains(i1,v1)
procedure p1,p2; if i1,i2; variable v1,v2; Select v1 such that Contains*(p1,i1) and Contains(i1,v1) with p1.procName="John"
procedure p1,p2; if i1,i2; variable v1,v2; assign a1,a2,a3; Select a1 such that Contains*(a1,v1) with v1.varName = "x"
procedure p1,p2; if i1,i2; variable v1,v2; assign a1,a2,a3; Select a1 such that Contains(a1,v1) with v1.varName = "x"
procedure p1,p2; if i1,i2; variable v1,v2; assign a1,a2,a3; constant c1,c2; Select p1 such that Contains*(p1,c1) with c1.value = 2
assign a1,a2,a3; constant c1,c2; minus sub; Select a1 such that Contains*(a1,sub)
procedure p1,p2; if i1,i2; variable v1,v2; assign a1,a2,a3; constant c1,c2; plus add; while w1,w2; Select i1 such that Contains*(i1,w1) and Contains(w1,v1) with v1.varName="x"
procedure p1,p2; if i1,i2; variable v1,v2; assign a1,a2,a3; constant c1,c2; plus add; while w1,w2; Select w1 such that Contains(w1,v1) with v1.varName="x"
procedure p1,p2; if i1,i2; variable v1,v2; assign a1,a2,a3; constant c1,c2; plus add; while w1,w2; Select w1 such that Contains(w1,v1) with v1.varName="x"
procedure p1,p2; if i1,i2; variable v1,v2; assign a1,a2,a3; constant c1,c2; plus add; while w1,w2; Select w1 such that Contains(w1,v1) with v1.varName="x"
constant c1,c2,c3; variable v1,v2,v3; procedure p1,p2; stmt s1,s2,s3; assign a1,a2,a3,a4; while w1,w2; if i1,i2; Select v1 such that Contains(i1,v1)
constant c1,c2,c3; variable v1,v2,v3; procedure p1,p2; stmt s1,s2,s3; assign a1,a2,a3,a4; while w1,w2; if i1,i2; Select v1 such that Contains*(i1,v1)
constant c1,c2,c3; variable v1,v2,v3; procedure p1,p2; stmt s1,s2,s3; assign a1,a2,a3,a4; while w1,w2; if i1,i2; Select p1.procName such that Contains*(p1,i1) such that Uses(i1,"m")

constant c1,c2,c3; variable v1,v2,v3; procedure p1,p2; stmt s1,s2,s3; assign a1,a2,a3,a4; while w1,w2; if i1,i2; Select p1.procName such that Contains*(p1,a1) with a1.stmt#=a2.stmt# pattern a2("m",_"b"_)

constant c1,c2,c3; variable v1,v2,v3; procedure p1,p2; stmt s1,s2,s3; assign a1,a2,a3,a4; while w1,w2; if i1,i2; Select <a1,a2> with a1.stmt#=89 such that Contains*(a1,v1) with v1.varName = "z" such that Contains*(a2,v2) with v2.varName = "q"
constant c1,c2,c3; variable v1,v2,v3; procedure p1,p2; stmt s1,s2,s3; assign a1,a2,a3,a4; while w1,w2; if i1,i2; Select a2 such that Contains*(a2,v2) with v2.varName = "x"

constant c1,c2,c3; variable v1,v2,v3; procedure p1,p2; stmt s1,s2,s3; assign a1,a2,a3,a4; while w1,w2; if i1,i2; Select <a1,a2,a3> with a1.stmt#=a2.stmt# and a3.stmt#=a2.stmt# such that Contains*(a2,v2) with v2.varName = "x"

constant c1,c2,c3; variable v1,v2,v3; procedure p1,p2; stmt s1,s2,s3; assign a1,a2,a3,a4; while w1,w2; if i1,i2; Select p1 such that Contains*(p1, c1) such that Contains*(p1,c2) with c1.value = 10 with c2.value = 2
constant c1,c2,c3; variable v1,v2,v3; procedure p1,p2; stmt s1,s2,s3; assign a1,a2,a3,a4; while w1,w2; if i1,i2; plus add; Select a1 such that Contains*(a1, add)

constant c1,c2,c3; variable v1,v2,v3; procedure p1,p2; stmt s1,s2,s3; assign a1,a2,a3,a4; while w1,w2; if i1,i2; plus add; minus m; Select <a1,a2> such that Contains*(a1, c1) and Contains*(a2,v1) and Contains*(a1,v2) and Contains*(a2,v3) with c1.value = 5 and v1.varName = "x" and v2.varName = "i" and v3.varName = v2.varName

constant c1,c2,c3; variable v1,v2,v3; procedure p1,p2; stmt s1,s2,s3; assign a1,a2,a3,a4; while w1,w2; if i1,i2; plus add; minus m; Select <a1,a2> such that Contains*(a1, c1) and Contains*(a2,v1) and Contains*(a1,v2) and Contains*(a2,v3) with c1.value = 5 and v1.varName = "x" and v2.varName = "i" and v3.varName = v2.varName
constant c1,c2,c3; variable v1,v2,v3; procedure p1,p2; stmt s1,s2,s3; assign a1,a2,a3,a4; while w1,w2; if i1,i2; plus add; minus m; Select s1 such that Sibling (s1, 4)

constant c1,c2,c3; variable v1,v2,v3; procedure p1,p2; stmt s1,s2,s3; assign a1,a2,a3,a4; while w1,w2; if i1,i2; plus add; minus m; Select <s1,s2> such that Sibling(s1, 29) such that Sibling(s1,s2) such that Uses(s2,"x")

constant c1,c2,c3; variable v1,v2,v3; procedure p1,p2; stmt s1,s2,s3; assign a1,a2,a3,a4; while w1,w2; if i1,i2; plus add; minus m; Select <s1,s2> with s1.stmt#=6 such that Sibling(s1,s2) and Contains*(s2,v1) with v1.varName = "b" such that Contains*(s1,c1) with c1.value = 9

constant c1,c2,c3; variable v1,v2,v3; procedure p1,p2; stmt s1,s2,s3; assign a1,a2,a3,a4; while w1,w2; if i1,i2; plus add; minus m; Select <a1,a2> such that Affects(a1, a2) with a1.stmt#=a2.stmt# such that Sibling(a1,a2)
assign a1,a2; stmt s1, s2, s3; procedure p; constant c; Select c.value such that Contains*(p,c)
assign a1,a2; stmt s1, s2, s3; procedure p; constant c; variable v; Select <v.varName,c.value> such that Contains*(p,c) and Sibling(v,c)

constant c1,c2,c3; variable v1,v2,v3; procedure p1,p2; stmt s1,s2,s3; assign a1,a2,a3,a4; while w1,w2; if i1,i2; plus add; minus m; Select <p1,a1,v1> such that Uses(p1,v1) with p1.procName= "Peter" such that Contains*(a1,v1) with v1.varName = "b" such that Contains*(p1,a1)
query.stuans: Peter 7 b,Peter 11 b,Peter 3 b,Peter 6 b,Peter 8 b,Peter 10 b,Peter 12 b,Peter 14 b,Peter 15 b
query.correct: Peter 10 b,Peter 11 b,Peter 12 b,Peter 14 b,Peter 15 b,Peter 3 b,Peter 6 b,Peter 7 b,Peter 8 b

query.querystr: assign a1,a2,a3,a4; plus add; minus m; times mult; Select a1 such that Contains*(a1,mult) and Contains*(a1,add) and Contains*(a1,m)
if i1; plus add; minus m; times mult; variable v; procedure p; Select v such that Contains*(i1,v) and Contains*(p,i1) with p.procName = "Bob"

id.comment: What are the while statements with 'x' as a control variable?

query.querystr: while w; variable v; Select w pattern w(v, _)

id.comment: StmtLst while

query.querystr: stmtLst lst; variable v; while w; Select w pattern w(v, lst)

id.comment: StmtLst if

query.querystr: stmtLst then, else; variable v; if iff; Select <v, then, else> pattern iff(v, then, else)

id.comment: StmtLst if

query.querystr: stmtLst then, else; variable v; if iff; Select v pattern iff(v, _, _)

id.comment: Select control variables of ifs such that then and else stmtLst contains while loops

query.querystr: stmtLst then, else; variable v; if iff; while w1, w2; Select v pattern iff(v, then, else) such that Contains*(then, w1) such that Contains*(else, w2)

id.comment: Select control variables of ifs such that then stmtLst contains while loops

query.querystr: stmtLst then, else; variable v; if iff; while w1, w2; Select v pattern iff(v, then, else) such that Contains*(then, w1)

id.comment: Select control variables of ifs such that then stmtLst contains while loops and else stmtLst contains calls

query.querystr: stmtLst then, else; variable v; if iff; while w1; call c; Select v pattern iff(v, then, else) such that Contains*(then, w1) and Contains*(else, c)

id.comment: StmtLst while

query.querystr: stmtLst lst; variable v; while w; if iff; assign a; Select v pattern w(v, lst) with v.varName = "x" such that Contains(lst, iff) such that Contains(a, v)

id.comment: StmtLst if

query.querystr: stmtLst then, else; variable v; if iff; while w; Select <v, then, else> pattern iff(v, then, else) with v.varName = "b" such that Contains*(then, w) such that Contains*(else, w)

id.comment: StmtLst while

query.querystr: stmtLst lst; variable v; while w; if iff; assign a; Select <v, lst> pattern w(v, lst) with v.varName = "x" such that Contains(lst, iff) such that Contains(a, v)

id.comment: StmtLst if

query.querystr: stmtLst then, else; variable v; if iff; while w; Select <v, then, w> pattern iff(v, then, else) with v.varName = "b" such that Contains*(then, w)

id.comment: StmtLst while

query.querystr: stmtLst lst; variable v; while w; if iff; assign a; Select <v, lst, iff, a> pattern w(v, lst) with v.varName = "x" such that Contains(lst, iff) such that Contains(iff, a)

id.comment: StmtLst if

query.querystr: stmtLst then, else; variable v; if iff; while w; Select <v, else, w> pattern iff(v, then, else) with v.varName = "b" such that Contains*(else, w )

id.comment: StmtLst while

query.querystr: stmtLst lst; variable v; while w; if if1, if2; assign a; Select <if1, if2> pattern w(v, lst) with v.varName = "x" such that Contains(lst, if1) such that Contains*(if1, if2)
assign a1,a2; stmt s1, s2, s3; procedure p; constant c; variable v; Select <v.varName,c.value> such that Contains*(a1, c) and Sibling(v,c) with c.value = 0

id.comment: Assignment 4 returns all the variables that control some if statement

query.querystr: variable v; if ifStmt; Select v such that Contains (ifStmt, v)

id.comment: Assignment 4 returns all the variables that control some if statement but in addition if statement must be in procedure Peter

query.querystr: variable v; if ifStmt; procedure p; Select v such that Contains (ifStmt, v) and Contains* (p, ifStmt) with p.procName="Peter"

id.comment: Assignment 4 returns all the assignments that refer to x (either on the left- or right-hand-side)

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a such that Contains* (a, v) with v.varName="x"

id.comment: Assignment 4 returns all the procedures that refer to constant 2

query.querystr: procedure p; constant c; Select p such that Contains* (p, c) with c.value=2

id.comment: Assignment 4 returns all the assignments with plus nodes that refer to x (either on the left- or right-hand-side of plus)

query.querystr: plus add; variable v; assign a; Select a such that Contains* (a, add) and Contains* (add, v) with v.varName="x"

id.comment: Assignment 4 return all procedures in which while is nested in if statement

query.querystr: procedure p; if ifStmt; while w; Select p such that Contains* (p, ifStmt) and Contains* (ifStmt, w)

id.comment: Assignment 4 the same as Parent* (9, s)

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Contains* (9, s)

id.comment: Assignment 4 - true if some stmt is nested in statement 9

query.querystr: stmt s; Select BOOLEAN such that Contains*(9, s)

id.comment: Assignment 4 Complex mix and match

query.querystr: variable v; if ifStmt; while w; stmtLst then, else; Select v such that Contains (ifStmt, v) and Modifies ("John", v) pattern ifStmt("i", then, else) such that Contains (then, w) and Contains (else, ifStmt)
variable v; assign a; while w; if ifStmt; Select v such that Contains*(a, v) or Contains*(w, v) or Contains*(ifStmt, v)

id.comment: all variables in the while loop

query.querystr: variable v; while w; Select v such that Contains*(w, v)

id.comment: all stmts that are siblings are while loops

query.querystr: variable v; while w; stmt s; Select s such that Sibling(w, s)

id.comment: Select while loops such that it has at least 2 children

query.querystr: stmt s1, s2; while w; Select w such that Sibling(s1, s2) and Parent (w, s2)

id.comment: Assignment 4 returns all variables referred to in statement 10 -> m = b*9*m+(k-3)*n;

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Contains* (10, v)

id.comment: Assignment 4 returns all variables referred to in statement 130 -> y = y = (x + z - i * 2)*y;)

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Contains* (130, v)

id.comment: Assignment 4 returns all constants referred to in statement 130 -> y = y = (x + z - i * 2)*y;)

query.querystr: constant c; Select c such that Contains* (130, c)

id.comment: Assignment 4 returns all variables referred to in statement 110 -> z=x+5+1+x+m+y+i+k;

query.querystr: constant c; Select c such that Contains* (110, c)

id.comment: Assignment 4 returns all variables referred to in statement 126 -> if m

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Contains(126, v)

id.comment: Assignment 4 returns all variables referred to in statement 119 -> while z

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Contains(119, v)

id.comment: Assignment 4 returns all variables referred to in statement 110 -> z=x+5+1+x+m+y+i+k;

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Contains* (110, v)
